projects.title: SushCamp App Development
projects.description: A full stack Web solution for finding camping place
details: Developed a full-stack web application using Express.js with EJS templating for the frontend.
Integrated MongoDB Atlas for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Implemented RESTful routing to facilitate seamless navigation and interaction.
Ensured security through Passport.js authentication for user registration and login functionality.
Enabled users to list their own campgrounds by registering on the site.
Leveraged modern technologies to create a user-friendly and dynamic experience for campground exploration and management.

projects.title: Expenses Tracker App Development
projects.description: A user-friendly app solution for tracking expenses
details: Developed a mobile app for expense tracking utilising Firebase services for data management and security, enabling users to monitor and manage their expenses conveniently.
Implemented user authentication via email for secure access.
Utilised Firebase services for data storage and backend functionality.
Designed an intuitive user interface for easy expense tracking and management.

projects.title: E-commerce Furniture Shopping Website
projects.description: Developed an E-commerce website for furniture shopping using Java, JSP, and Servlets, providing users with a seamless online shopping experience.
